docs.snippet: Paytm, which has grown sharply over the past year, is acting to fend off WhatsApp’s planned move into India’s payments market.

docs.snippet: Martin Shkreli, the pharmaceutical executive already convicted of fraud, wrote online that he would pay $5,000 to anyone who grabbed a hair off Hillary Clinton.

headline.print_headline: Shkreli Faces New Trouble for Post on Clinton
headline.main: Prosecutors Seek to Revoke Shkreli’s Bail, Citing Post About Clinton

docs.snippet: The United States Navy identified the men as Bryan Grosso, Steven Combs and Matthew Chialastri.
